name: TwisterAutoSpinner(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, open auto spinner”
”Spin automatically”
”Change spin interval to five seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: auto spinner
des: Play twister without someone needing to be the dedicated spinner! Just say, 'spin automatically', and Alexa will call out a new move every 5 seconds. You can customize the time between moves to anywhere between 1 and 10 seconds by saying 'change my spin interval to {seconds}'. Or if preferred, say 'spin manually' for more control over spins.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
